mapper.select: SELECT W.WK_ID, W.WK_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, W.WK_PRORATE FROM RC_WORKLIST W, RC_MEMBER M WHERE W.PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND W.WK_PRORATE = 0 AND W.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND WK_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT W.WK_ID, W.WK_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, W.WK_PRORATE FROM RC_WORKLIST W, RC_MEMBER M WHERE W.PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND W.WK_PRORATE > 0 AND W.WK_PRORATE < 100 AND W.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND WK_DELYN = 'N'
